Don’t just present. Pitch.

Pitch is the AI presentation platform that helps professionals collaborate on, create, and deliver winning slide decks — all while staying on brand.

Get a head start with free templates

How Pitch works

Jake

Pitch is the complete pitching platform that takes your design and delivery to the next level. Keep everyone on brand with templates, collaborate on slides, and share decks or entire deal rooms.

Create a presentation
Joy
Jake
Charlotte
1 — Start

Generate, discover, or build a template

  • Start with AI or expert-made templates.
  • Create custom templates for your team.
  • Upload your own fonts and brand assets.
Start exploring now
2 — Edit

Create sleek slides faster than ever

  • Quickly add text, images, and interactive content.
  • Build elegant animations in seconds.
  • Collaborate with others in real time.
Start creating now
3 — Share

Convince anyone, from anywhere

  • Share your presentation with a live link.
  • Gather decks, links, and files in pitch rooms.
  • Present with notes, a timer, and other aids.
Start sharing now
4 — Measure

Know what’s working and who’s engaged

  • Manage your team’s outreach in one place.
  • See when someone opens a deck or room.
  • Track which slides your visitors view.
Start gaining insights

Connect your favorite apps and libraries

Enhance slides with interactive content, and streamline your pitching workflow.

A tool for the whole team

Need to create a pixel-perfect layout, craft a compelling story, or land your next big deal? Pitch is packed with features for anyone working with presentations.

“I love Pitch and have used it for Perplexity’s fund raises, board meetings, and internal company presentations. If you’re still on Google Slides, migrate — you won’t regret it!”

Aravind Srinivas, CEO

“I can create my style guide with custom fonts, and edit templates quickly and way more effectively than with PowerPoint or Keynote.”

Brando Vasquez, Branding and Design Lead

“When we share a presentation via a link, we can see the stats on who opened it. It’s a great way of collaborating with clients.”

Stephanie McSwiney, VP Sales

“It’s great to have a tool that enables people who aren’t designers to be designers. With minimal effort, our design team can help others do their jobs really well.”

Gabriel MacSweeney, Head of Product Marketing & Content
